articles.author: Samantha Waldenberg, Michael Rios
articles.title: Trump reiterates threat to retake Panama Canal ‘or something very powerful’ will happen - CNN
articles.description: President Donald Trump reiterated his vow to “take back” the Panama Canal on Sunday, warning of “powerful” US action in an escalating diplomatic dispute with the Central American country  over China’s presence around the vital waterway.
